nav.top_nav1: Do you have a car? Rent it out on Dos

hero.title: Rent Your Perfect Car Easily – Competitive Prices and Instant Booking
hero.desc: Your journey starts with us! Discover a variety of car rental options to suit all your needs, whether you're traveling for business or leisure.

about.title: About Dos
about.subtitle: An innovative car rental platform... serving every traveler worldwide

why_us.title: Why Dos?
why_us.desc: Whether you're traveling for business, leisure, or even a family vacation, we're here to provide you with a car that meets your needs within minutes.
why_us.desc1: Rent your car easily wherever you are, with support tailored to each country’s culture.
why_us.desc2: From economy to luxury and family cars.
why_us.desc3: Book your car within minutes, hassle-free.
why_us.desc4: Partnering with the best local service providers.

cars.title: Explore available cars and choose what suits you
cars.desc: A wide selection of economy, family, and luxury cars to meet all your needs – rent your car within minutes, wherever you are.

download.title: All the cars in the world... in your pocket!
download.desc1: Download the app and enjoy a fast, easy, and secure car rental experience in any country.
download.desc2: With our app, renting a car has never been easier. Browse hundreds of options — from economy and family cars to luxury vehicles — across multiple countries, and book in just minutes.
download.desc3: The app is designed to give you a smooth and convenient user experience, with local support in every country, competitive prices, and secure payment methods.
download.desc4: Whether you’re planning a business trip or a vacation, your car is waiting... just one tap away.

branches.title: Our Branches
branches.desc: We cover many countries around the world through a network of local service providers to ensure you have the best rental experience wherever you go.

provider_download.title: Got a car? List it for rent on Dos
provider_download.desc: List your car on our app now and start reaching more customers with ease.

FOOTER.desc: Your journey starts with us! Discover a variety of car rental options to suit all your needs, whether you're traveling for business or leisure.

static_pages.download: Download the app now and enjoy an easy, fast, and secure car rental experience in any country.
static_pages.download_desc1: With our app, renting a car has never been easier. Browse hundreds of options from economy, family, and luxury cars in multiple countries, and book in just minutes.
static_pages.download_desc2: The app is designed to provide you with a smooth and comfortable user experience, with local support for each country, competitive prices, and secure payment methods.
static_pages.download_desc3: Whether you're planning a business trip or a vacation, your car is waiting for you... with just one tap.

validation.name_min: Name should be at least 2 characters long
validation.name_max: Name should be at most 30 characters long

validation.last_name_letters_only: Last Name should contain only letters
validation.terms_required: Accepting Terms and Conditions is required
validation.first_name_min: First Name should be at least 2 characters long
validation.first_name_max: First Name should be at most 20 characters long
validation.last_name_min: Last Name should be at least 2 characters long
validation.last_name_max: Last Name should be at most 20 characters long
validation.password_min: Password should be at least 8 characters long
validation.password_strength: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
validation.phone_too_short: Phone Number should be at least {length} digits
validation.phone_too_long: Phone Number should be at most {length} digits

error.not_found_desc1: It seems the link you are trying to access is incorrect or no longer available.
error.not_found_desc2: Please return to the homepage and continue browsing.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: We are here to provide support and answer all your inquiries. Feel free to reach out to us for any assistance.
contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully
contact.name: Name
contact.message_min: Message must be at least 3 characters long

filters.same_location: Return the car to the same location
filters.no_result_desc: It seems there are no vehicles that match your current criteria. You can adjust the filters or expand your search.
